org.javascool.proglets.game
Class Geometry

java.lang.Object
  org.javascool.proglets.game.LinkedEventGroup
      org.javascool.proglets.game.Accessible
          org.javascool.proglets.game.Geometry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, EventCatcher
Direct Known Subclasses:
Line, Oval, Rect, Sprite
public abstract class Geometry
extends Accessible
implements Drawable

This class is parent of all the objects that are rectangular, that can be placed on the proglet's panel and recieve events if the mouse pointer is above them.

Author:
gmatheron
